oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jahrrechnungen der Stadt Basel 1535 bis 1610
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: City Accounts
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Prof. Susanna Burghartz from the University of Basel prepared an edition of the annual municipal accounts of Basel in the 16th century, which is major source for the social and economic history of the town. In cooperataion with the ZIM the project created a semantically enriched edition following the research result of Georg Vogeler on the digital edition of medieval and early modern accounting. The edition allows to access the accounts as texts and as numerical data as well.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Institute Centre for Information Modelling, University of Graz
